Kurt Cobain: The Early Life of a Legend documents the troubled childhood of Nirvana frontman Kurt Cobain. The film tracks his life until just before the release of Nevermind would make him one of the most famous rock stars in the world. In addition to archival footage, the film utilizes interviews with many of the people who knew Cobain and played music with him.
